requirement: Fix candidate seeding source metadata mapping
notes: Source lineage no longer collapses to unknown host.

requirement: Source-link synthetic component-review candidates
notes: Synthetic review candidates now write source_registry/source_assertions.

requirement: Test-mode SpecDb resync uses compiled rules
notes: Uses loadFieldRules(...) instead of raw field_rules.json.

requirement: Field-meta detection supports both contract shapes
notes: Supports rules.fields and top-level fields.

requirement: Bind item slot selected candidate IDs during seed
notes: Slot values now map to best matching candidate IDs when possible.

requirement: Enforce ID-only write context across mutation endpoints
notes: Write paths require IDs by action type; resolver fallback branches still exist for non-required flows.

requirement: Component identity IDs in payloads
notes: SpecDb and legacy payload paths both emit component_identity_id.

requirement: Baseline-to-current integrity deltas
notes: missing_source_assertions_for_candidates 2268->0; source_registry 22->130; item_component_links 0->80; source_registry_unknown_source_host 22->0.

requirement: Add slot FK columns + indexes to key_review_state and backfill
notes: Grid/component/enum slot IDs now persisted and backfilled.

requirement: Add component_identity_id FK to component_values
notes: Column/FK is not present in current schema.

requirement: Harden enum ownership (require list_values.list_id)
notes: Backfill and rename/delete integrity are in place; list_id remains nullable at schema level.

requirement: Remove residual resolver fallback branches
notes: Fallback lookup by product/field or identifiers remains in resolver helpers.

requirement: Normalize candidate ID contract for source-level actions
notes: Candidate context/value mismatches are rejected.

requirement: Unknown values stay non-actionable
evidence: src/api/guiServer.js:6605, src/api/guiServer.js:6708, src/api/guiServer.js:6882, src/api/guiServer.js:7559, src/api/guiServer.js:7714, test/reviewLaneContractApi.test.js
notes: Accept/confirm blocked for unknown/empty values across grid/component/enum lanes.

requirement: Pending AI indicators only for actionable candidates
notes: Actionable excludes synthetic/unknown rows.

requirement: Synthetic selected candidates are display-only
notes: Synthetic selected rows are non-actionable in pending calculations.

requirement: Component and enum pending target IDs derive from actionable candidates
notes: Pending target collection filters non-meaningful candidate values.

requirement: GET review routes are read-only
evidence: test/reviewLaneContractApi.test.js (component review GET does not mutate synthetic candidates on read)
notes: No write mutation observed on GET path.

requirement: Component rows require linkage/actionable pending/stable non-pipeline data
notes: Visibility filter suppresses non-actionable/no-link noise.

requirement: Pipeline enum pending rows require linkage to stay visible
notes: No explicit linkage gate found for pending pipeline enum rows.

requirement: Accept Item mutates only target grid slot
notes: Cross-slot mutation blocked in lane-contract matrix.

requirement: Confirm Item mutates only target grid slot
notes: Primary confirm remains slot-scoped.

requirement: Accept Shared mutates only authoritative shared context
notes: Propagation constrained by target_kind + context keys.

requirement: Confirm Shared does not alias accept
notes: Accept and confirm remain distinct transitions.

requirement: Grid lane endpoint rejects non-grid states
notes: Prevents cross-surface mutation via raw key_review_state ID.

requirement: Slot shape normalization utility
notes: Scalar/list normalization and deterministic list serialization are present.

requirement: Runtime engine rejects malformed scalar array/object payloads
notes: Returns shape_mismatch for invalid scalar shapes.

requirement: Seed normalizes candidate and item slot values before SQL persistence
notes: Unknown/malformed values are filtered or demoted.

requirement: Review payload selection order is deterministic
notes: Order is override -> accepted candidate -> top candidate -> unk.

requirement: Deterministic seed and reproducible run ID
notes: buildRunId uses randomBytes suffix, so run IDs are not deterministic.

requirement: Post-run validator for off-target mutation + badge/cell-drawer consistency reports
notes: Validation endpoint exists, but no dedicated mutation-audit/badge-diff report artifacts were found.

requirement: UI automation sequence testing across slot types
notes: Contract-level GUI click simulation exists; no separate browser automation script was identified.

requirement: Phase4 output artifacts under data/fixit
